Module com.oracle.javacard.amservice
Package com.oracle.javacard.ams

Interface AMSession

All Superinterfaces:
Scriptable<CardChannel,CommandAPDU,ResponseAPDU>
public interface AMSession extends Scriptable<CardChannel,CommandAPDU,ResponseAPDU>
Represents an application management session.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default AMSession
    append(CommandAPDU command)
    Appends this session with the APDU command specified.
    AMSession
    close()
    Closes this session.
    AMSession
    install(String cname, String aname, String iname, Object... params)
    Appends this session with the commands to install the specified Applet
    AMSession
    load(String name, byte[] loadFile)
    Appends this session with the commands to load the CAP file from loadFile
    AMSession
    uninstall(String... name)
    Appends this session with the commands to uninstall the specified Applet instances
    AMSession
    unload(String name)
    Appends this session with the commands to unload the specified CAP file.
    AMSession
    unload(String name, boolean withInstances)
    Appends this session with the commands to unload the specified CAP file and optionally also uninstall simultaneously all Applet instances created from it.

    Methods inherited from interface com.oracle.javacard.ams.script.Scriptable

    run, run

  • Method Details

    • load

      AMSession load(String name, byte[] loadFile) throws IOException
      Appends this session with the commands to load the CAP file from loadFile
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the CAP file loaded
      loadFile - the application code to load (serialized CAP file components)
      Returns:
      this session object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs when reading the loadFile

    • install

      AMSession install(String cname, String aname, String iname, Object... params) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Appends this session with the commands to install the specified Applet
      Parameters:
      cname - the name of the CAP file already loaded - see load(String, byte[])
      aname - the name of the Applet class to instantiate
      iname - the name of the Applet instance to create
      params - installation parameters
      Returns:
      this session object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      See Also:
      • load(String, byte[])

    • uninstall

      AMSession uninstall(String... name)
      Appends this session with the commands to uninstall the specified Applet instances
      Parameters:
      name - the Applet instance(s) to uninstall
      Returns:
      this session object

    • unload

      AMSession unload(String name)
      Appends this session with the commands to unload the specified CAP file. Application instances created from this CAP file must be uninstalled first.
      Parameters:
      name - the CAP file name
      Returns:
      this session object
      See Also:
      • #uninstall(String...) to uninstall application instance
      • #unload(String, boolean) to simultaneously uninstall instances and unload CAP file

    • unload

      AMSession unload(String name, boolean withInstances)
      Appends this session with the commands to unload the specified CAP file and optionally also uninstall simultaneously all Applet instances created from it.
      Parameters:
      name - the CAP file name
      withInstances - true to uninstall Applet instances simultaneously, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      this session object

    • append

      default AMSession append(CommandAPDU command)
      Appends this session with the APDU command specified. Depending on the session properties, this APDU command may be altered and wrapped into a secure channel.
      Parameters:
      command - the plain APDU command to insert
      Returns:
      this session object

    • close

      AMSession close()
      Closes this session.
      Returns:
      this session object
